summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1773 for the improvement of West Sixty-first Street, West Sixty-second Street and West Sixty-third Street, each from Eighth Avenue Northwest to three hundred (300) feet west of the west line of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, lampholes, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 18672 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
